st: Jaane Meri Aankhon Se Kitne Aansu Bah Gaye,
s:
Jaane Meri Aankhon Se Kitne Aansu Bah Gaye,
Insaano Ki Bheed Mein Bhi Dekho Tanha Rah Gaye,

Karte The Jo Kabhi Apni Wafa Ki Baatein,
Aaj Wohi Sanam Mujhe Bewafa Kah Gaye….

st: Dastan Soon Lo Jara Ghame Zindgi,
s:
Dastan Soon Lo Jara Ghame Zindgi,
Bewafa Samajh Baithe Tumhe Dilagi,

Gairon Ki Baahon Main Machlati Ho Tum,
Behad Mehesoos Hoti Hai Hame Shermindagi…

st: Bedaag Or Begunah Meri Sarkar Hain,
s:
Bedaag Or Begunah Meri Sarkar Hain,
Humse unki Bewafai Se Waqt Ki Maar Hain,

Woh Bhale Hain Kitne Sitam Karein Hum Par,
Phir Bhi Mere Liye Wo Jaane Bahar Hain….

st: Kehte Hai Gam Baatne Se Hota Hai Kam,
s:
Kehte Hai Gam Baatne Se Hota Hai Kam,
Aisa Hi Kabhi Pele Maante The Hum,

Tere Pyar Ki Nishani Tera Gam Hi To Hai Mere Paas,
Wo Bhi Baatdu To Rahega Kya Mere Paas,

Sochta Hoon In Sagar Ki Lehro Ko Dekh Kar,
Kyon Yeh Kinaro Se Takra Kar Palat Jati Hai,

Karti Hai Vo Kinare Se Bewafai Ya Fir Sagar Se Wafa Nibhati Hai…

st: Mujhe Kisi Ne Bewafa Ka Naam Diya,
s:
Mujhe Kisi Ne Bewafa Ka Naam Diya,
Sathi Ne Jaise Jahar Ka Jaam Diya,
Jo Kabhi Kaha Karte The Bhula Mat Dena,
Unhone Hi Bhul Jane Ka Paigam Diya…

st: Ikatthaa Karke, Woh Mere Katl Ka Samaan,
s:
Ikatthaa Karke, Woh Mere Katl Ka Samaan,
Bewafa Adaaon Se Teer Chalaate Gaye,

Hamein Aadat Thi Use Muskurata Dekhne Ki,
Isiliye,
Hum Uski Har Adaa Par Muskuraate Gaye…

st: Humne Puchha Yaar Se Itna,
s:
Humne Puchha Yaar Se Itna,
Kaise Woh Bewafa Ho Gaye,

Bole Woh Ki Tumse Kya,
Teri Jeb Se Sikke Kho Gaye…

st: Yaad Aa Gayi Fir Humko,
s:
Yaad Aa Gayi Fir Humko,
Kuchh Bhuli Huyi Baatein Yaaro,

Royenge Jinmein Kuredkar Jakham,
Aa Gayi Fir Woh Baatein Yaaro…

st: Huyi Toh Hai Yeh Khata Humse Bahut Bhari Sanam,
s:
Huyi Toh Hai Yeh Khata Humse Bahut Bhari Sanam,
Na Chahte Huye Bhi Hum Aapse Pyar Kar Baithe,
Roka Tha Humein Sab Ne Ki Na Kar Tu Sagar,
Na Jaane Fir Bhi Kyu Tera Aitbaar Kar Baithe….

st: Mujhko Rulakar Woh Bhi Roya Toh Hoga Yaaro,
s:
Mujhko Rulakar Woh Bhi Roya Toh Hoga Yaaro,
Muh Ashko Se Usne Bhi Dhoya Toh Hoga Yaaro,
Agar Na Kiya Hai Kuchh Hasil Hamne Pyar Mein,
Kuchh Na Kuchh Usne Bhi Khoya Toh Hoga Yaaro….

st: Unki Yaadon Ko Abhi Bhi Seene Mein Chhupaye Baitha Hun,
s:
Unki Yaadon Ko Abhi Bhi Seene Mein Chhupaye Baitha Hun,
Haay Main Kis Jaalim Se Dil Ko Lagaye Baitha Hun,
Inhi Raahon Se Aayenge, Bhale Hi, Baad Mere Marne Ke,
Kitna Nadan Hun Abhi Bhi Dil Ko Samjhaye Baitha Hun…

st: Mujhko Rulane Se Milta Hai Sabko Na Jaane Kya,
s:
Mujhko Rulane Se Milta Hai Sabko Na Jaane Kya,
Na Jaane Kyu Us Khuda Ko Bhi Raham Aata Nahi,
Maine Kabhi Bhi Na Ki Sikayat, Bhale Hi Laakh Gham Mile,
Magar Mere Moulal Sagar Se Ab Aut Jiya Jata Nahi…

st: Yeh Manta Hun Main, Ki Har Koi Bewafa Nahi Hota,
s:
Yeh Manta Hun Main, Ki Har Koi Bewafa Nahi Hota,
Magar Teri Tarah Har Koi Sab Kuchh Toh Nahi Khota,
Yeh Bhi Sach Hai Ki Agar Mujhko Gham Nahi Milte,
Toh Is Duniya Mein Shayad Yeh Sagar Nahi Hota…

st: Aapki Yahi Adayein Toh Hain Eh Mere Humdam,
s:
Aapki Yahi Adayein Toh Hain Eh Mere Humdam,
Jo Humko Aap Par Marne Ko Majboor Karti Hain,

Magar Yeh Bhi Suna Hai Ke Hote Hain Sabhi Hasin Bewafa,
Aap Bhi Hasin Hain Yehi Baatein Aap Se Door Karti Hain…

st: Tu Bhi Hai Sangdil Bewafa Eh Dost,
s:
Tu Bhi Hai Sangdil Bewafa Eh Dost,
Yeh Sochkar Dil Ghabrata Hai,

Ab Karun Bhi Kya Ke Bin Tere,
Sagar Se Jiya Nahi Jata Hai…

st: Koi Toh Bataye Itna Mujhko,
s:
Koi Toh Bataye Itna Mujhko,
Kyu Bewafa Ho Jaate Hain Sab,

Saya Bhi Nahi Hai Saath Rahta,
Gham Ke Badal Chhate Hain Jab…

st: Kisko Farebi Hum Kahein Kisko Kahein Hum Bewafa,
s:
Kisko Farebi Hum Kahein Kisko Kahein Hum Bewafa,
Kismat Hi Shayad Aisi Likha Kar Laaye Hain Hum,

Aaj Wakif Hai Yaaro Hamse Sahar Ka Har Ek Aadmi,
Magar Apno Ke Liye Hi Dekhiye Paraye Hain Hum….

st: Zamane Wale Mil Gaye Hain Sabhi Ek Doosre Se,
s:
Zamane Wale Mil Gaye Hain Sabhi Ek Doosre Se,
Milkar Sabhi Ne Mujh Akele Ko Mara Hai,

Tu Bhi Mat Ho Jana Bewafa Sabhi Ki Tarah,
Eh Mere Dost Sagar Ko Bas Tera Sahara Hai…

st: Apne Aap Kpo Toh Hum Samjha Lenge,
s:
Apne Aap Kpo Toh Hum Samjha Lenge,
Magar Dil Mera Yeh Manta Hi Nahi,

Humne Toh Dekhi Hai Bewafayi Aapki,
Aap Bewafa Ho Dil Jaanta Hi Nahi….

st: Koi Bhi Nahi Yahan Par Apna Hota,
s:
Koi Bhi Nahi Yahan Par Apna Hota,
Is Duniya Ne Yeh Sikhya Hai Humko,

Uski Bewafayi Ka Na Charcha Karna,
Aaj Dil Ne Yeh Samjhaya Hai Humko…

st: Yeh Mana Ke Mohabbat Karna Hai Jurm Magar,
s:
Yeh Mana Ke Mohabbat Karna Hai Jurm Magar,
Yeh Jurm Yaaro Baar Baar Karte Hain Hum,

Woh Bewafa Hai Sangdil Hain Jaante Hai Magar,
Unpar Yaaro Aaj Bhi Aitbaar Karte Hain Hum…

st: Bewafa Nahi Hai Woh Yeh Manta Hun Main,
s:
Bewafa Nahi Hai Woh Yeh Manta Hun Main,
Woh Bhi Chahte Hain Hamein Yeh Jaanta Hun Main,

Magar Itna Bhi Toh Yaaron Nadan Nahi Hun Main,
Unki Badli Huyi Najrein Toh Pahchanta Hun Main…

st: Main Toh Yeh Bhi Nahi Kah Sakta Sagar,
s:
Main Toh Yeh Bhi Nahi Kah Sakta Sagar,
Ki Is Mein Galti Mere Yaar Ki Hai,

Bewafa Bhi Usko Main Kahun Kaise,
Kyun Ki Toheen Yeh Mere Pyar Ki Hai…

st: Hamne Toh Apni Mohabbat Ka Ijhaar Kiya,
s:
Hamne Toh Apni Mohabbat Ka Ijhaar Kiya,
Magar Usne Fir Bhi Na Hamara Eitbaar Kiya,

Sagat Toh Jahan Se Lada, Ek Uski Khatir,
Us Bewafa Ne Sikwa Fir Bhi Hazaar Kiya…

st: Jaisa Karoge Aap Vaisa Hi Paaoge Sada,
s:
Jaisa Karoge Aap Vaisa Hi Paaoge Sada,
Aaj Sabke Hoton Par Yeh Sachhayi Mili,

Magar Kaise Maan Lun Main Is Baat Ko Sach,
Mujhko Toh Wafa Ke Badle Bewafayi Mili…

st: Khafa Hokar Humse Fir Maan Jana,
s:
Khafa Hokar Humse Fir Maan Jana,
Yahi Ada Toh Humko Bahut Bhati Hai,

Baaki Toh Sabkuchh Bhool Chuke Hain Hum,
Magar Sagar Woh Bewafa Bahut Yaad Aati Hai…

st: Wafa Sabse Karne Ka Hamein Yeh Sila Mila,
s:
Wafa Sabse Karne Ka Hamein Yeh Sila Mila,
Humko Is Jamane Se Hamesha Gila Mila,

Ab Aur Kya Kahu Main Aapse Eh Mere Dosto,
Hamein Toh Jo Bhi Dost Mila Bewafa Mila…

st: Aap Kyu Sarminda Hote Ho Apni Bewafayi Par,
s:
Aap Kyu Sarminda Hote Ho Apni Bewafayi Par,
Hamein Maalum Tha Ki Gham Ko Hamara Hona Tha,

Bas Aap Muskarate Rahein Yeh Dua Hai Sagar Ki,
Hamati Kismat Mein Toh Likha Hi Rona Tha…

st: Woh De Denge Humko Daga Kabhi Na Kabhi,
s:
Woh De Denge Humko Daga Kabhi Na Kabhi,
Yeh Dil Hamara Humko Bata Chuka Tha,

Magar Kya Karta Yeh Sagar Bhi Yaaro,
Dil Iska Us Bewafa Pe Aa Chuka Tha…

st: Aaina Dekh Ke Kya Se Kya Ho Gaya,
s:
Aaina Dekh Ke Kya Se Kya Ho Gaya,
Joh Wafa Tha Kabhi Bewafa Ho Gaya,

Tere Dil Ke Shahar Mein, Naa Apna Koi,
Pyaas Joh Dikh Gayi, Dariya Ho Gaya,

Dushmano Se Mile, Kuch Baat Ban Gayi,
Dost Kam Khush Huye, Aur Khafa Ho Gaya,

Ah Meri Zindagi, Ab Mere Saath Chal,
Mout Kya Dikh Gayi, Kya Nasha Ho Gaya…

st: Mohabbat Mein, Bekar, Dil Ko Tadpana, Hamein Achha Nahi Lagta,
s:
Mohabbat Mein, Bekar, Dil Ko Tadpana, Hamein Achha Nahi Lagta,
Har Kisi Ko, Palko Pe Bithana, Hamein Achha Nahi Lagta,

Sacha Saathi Toh Hamein, Aaj Tak Mila Nahi Koi, Sagar,
Kisi Bewafa Ko, Dil Mein Basana, Hamein Achha Nahi Lagta….

st: Apno Ne Hamein Yeh Shikhaya Hai,
s:
Apno Ne Hamein Yeh Shikhaya Hai,
Ki Bewafayi Kya Hoti Hai,

Door Unse Huye Toh Jana,
Ki Judai Kya Hoti Hai…

st: Aap Se Kyu Na Karein Pyar Hum,
s:
Aap Se Kyu Na Karein Pyar Hum,
Aap Humko Jo Achhe Lagte Ho,

Log Kahte Hain Hasee Hote Hain Bewafa,
Aya Karein Aap Toh Sache Lagte Hain…

st: Char Dino Ki Thi Zindagi Jaane Kaise Beet Gayi,
s:
Char Dino Ki Thi Zindagi Jaane Kaise Beet Gayi,
Thukara Ke Yahan Sab Humko Bewafa Hi Kahte Rahe,

Magar Na Kisi Se Hamne Aaj Talak Kiya Shikwa,
Hum Bhi Na Jaane Kaise The Chup Chap Sitam Sahte Rahe…

st: Woh intezaar ki chokhat par so gaya hoga
s:
Woh intezaar ki chokhat par so gaya hoga
Kisi se vakt toh puchein ki kya baja hoga,

Main hans raha hu latifon ki sheri mahfil mein
Woh meri aankho se is vakt ro raha hoga,

Yeh pathron ki tarah kyu udas rahta hai
Mujhe yakin hai ke dil iska aaina hoga,

Main is khayal se uske karib aaya tha
Ki dusron ki tarah woh bhi bewafa hoga…

st: Badr woh aankhe bahut dhund rahi hai tumko
s:
Badr woh aankhe bahut dhund rahi hai tumko
Chand ki chodhavi tarikh hai upar dekho,

Raar soyi huyi ranaiyon ne mujh se kaha
Hum tumhari hi gajal hain kabhi humko bhi kaho,

Chandani raat mein kah jati hai aahat jaise
Hum bahut pass hain aawaj na do humko suno,

st: Ab tere mere beech koi fasla bhi ho
s:
Ab tere mere beech koi fasla bhi ho
Hum log jab milein toh koi doosra bhi ho,

Tu janta nahin meri chahat ajib hai
Mujhko mana raha hai kabhi khud khafa bhi ho,

Tu bewafa nahi hai magar bewafayi kar
Uski najar mein rahne ka koi silsila bhi ho,

st: Hamari Zindagi Hai Mout Se Badtar Tumhare Bina,
s:
Hamari Zindagi Hai Mout Se Badtar Tumhare Bina,
Sukhon Ke Sarjamon Mein Chubhe Nastar Tumhare Bina,

Katati Hai Hawa Ki Narmi Nahin Jab Paas Tum,
Khuabuon Ki Mahmahat Jahar Tumhaare Bin,

st: Maine Bhi Kabhi,
s:
Maine Bhi Kabhi,
Kisi Se Pyar Kiya Tha,

Thoda Nahi Besumaar Kiya Tha,
Mujhe Kya Pata Tha Ki Woh Bhul Jayegi Humein,

Kasoor Unka Nahi,
Mera Tha, Jo Ek Bewfaa Se Pyar Kiya Tha…

st: Kisne Khusbu Se Basaya Hai Kafan Ko Mere,
s:
Kisne Khusbu Se Basaya Hai Kafan Ko Mere,
Ki Duayen Mujhe Sab Ahle Karam Dete Hain,

Mujhse Kahte Hain Woh Parwane Ko Dekha Tune,
Dekh Yun Jalte Hain Is Tarah Se Dam Dete Hain,

Tu Wafa Agar Karti Jo Eh Umar E Ravaan Kya Hota,
Bewafayi Pe Teri Sankado Dam Lete Hain,

Ranj Dene Kaabas Daag Hai Hai Sikwa Unse,
Jisko Deta Hai Khuda Usko Sanam Dete Hain….

st: Yeh Dil Ka Soda Hai,
s:
Yeh Dil Ka Soda Hai,
Na Soda Hai Sirf Chand Raato Ka,

Tum Hamein Dil Mein Basa Lo,
Yeh Soda Hai Sirf Jajbaato Ka,

Sone Ki Chamak Kho Jati Hai Vakt Bewafa Jab Ho,
Dushman Apna Ho Jata Hai Vakt Meharba Jab Ho…

st: Lakh Dusman Ho Jamana,
s:
Lakh Dusman Ho Jamana,
Hum Tera Saath Na Chhodenge,

Gar Haathon Mein Aaya Haath,
Tera Haath Na Chhodenge,

Nibhaya Na Gaya Saath,
Toh Aapne Bahana Bana Liya,

Hamein Diya Ghamon Ka Sagar,
Khud Ne Kahin Aur Thikana Bana Liya,

Ahsaas Chahat Ka Hua Jab Sadma Laga Mujhe,
Jab Jab Chaha Tujhe Tu Bewafa Hi Laga Mujh…

st: Mohabbat Main Khata Huyi,
s:
Mohabbat Main Khata Huyi,
Jakhmi Dil Ki Duhaayi Hai,

Mere Jakhmi Dil Mein Unhe,
Apni Chahat Najar Aayi Hai,

Hamein Sudharne Ki Unki,
Koshise Nakaam Ho Gayi Hain,
Aaj Dekho Meri Chahat Nilam Ho Gayi Hai,

Kali Dil Ki Khili Thi Tere Paigam Ke Sath,
Dor Sans Ki Tuti Thi Bewafayi Ke Jam Ke Saath…

st: Jakham Kuchh Aise The Dil Par,
s:
Jakham Kuchh Aise The Dil Par,
Jo Sareaam Sabko Dikhaye Na Gaye,

Hamari Ki Gayi Wafa Ke Badle,
Us Bewafa Se Kabhi Chukaye Na Gaye,

st: Jab Se Bichhda Hai Sanam Hamara,
s:
Jab Se Bichhda Hai Sanam Hamara,
Dil Nahin Karta Ab Jine Ko,

Saath Lekar Chala Gaya Khusiyan,
Bas De Gaya Hamein Aansu Pine Ko…

st: Jab Bhi Gujar Hota Hai Yaaro,
s:
Jab Bhi Gujar Hota Hai Yaaro,
Unka Kabhi Hamari Raaho Se,

Log Badnaam Na Kar De Unko,
Isliye Dekhte Hi Nahin Nigaho Se,

Apni Luti Duniya Ke Liye,
Aakhir Kisko Main Badnaam Karu,

Teri Bewafayi Ka Charcha Sanam Mere,
Aakhir Kaise Main Khuleaam Karun…

st: Dushman Meri Jaan Ke Gulabi Mosam,
s:
Dushman Meri Jaan Ke Gulabi Mosam,
Kyu Yaad Dilata Hai Us Bewafa Ki,

Machal Uthegi Jawani Aur Chum Lunga Gaal,
Ghar Se Nikal Dogi Sahar Mein Ji Lunga,

Kabhi Na Kabhi Tujhe Meri Yaad Toh Aayegi,
Agar Ab Nahin Toh Mere Baad To Aayegi…

st: Pyar Karne Waale Diwane Kabhi Darte Nahi,
s:
Pyar Karne Waale Diwane Kabhi Darte Nahi,
Log Majnu Kahte Hain Par Woh Chidte Nahin,

Hamare Pyar Ki Majburiyan Koi Dekhe,
Khud Apne Aap Ko Hum Bewafa Bana Baithe,

st: Kya Jawab Doge Sanam,
s:
Kya Jawab Doge Sanam,
Khuda Ke Darbaar

Jab Puchhega Woh,
Kya Gull Khilaye Pyar Mein,

Suna Na Sakoge Dastaa,
Apni Bewafayi Ki,

st: Tu Pass Hai Mere Fir Khudayi Bhi Aake Mile,
s:
Tu Pass Hai Mere Fir Khudayi Bhi Aake Mile,
Kah Dunga Khuda Se Abhi Fursat Nahin Hai Yaar,

Teri Bawafayi Bhi Mujhko Kabool Hai Sanam,
Tujhse Bawasta Har Cheej Ajij Hai Ab Toh,

Teri Duniya Aur Meri Duniya Mein,
Bas Fark Itna Hai,
Tere Liya Hai Saari Duniya,
Aur Mere Liye Saaari Duniya Tu Hai,

Kuchh Aise Bhi Sirfire Hote Hain Duniya Mein,
Jaan Lene Ke Liye Jaan De Dete Hain Sanam….

st: Suna Na Sakoge Dastaa Apni Bewafayi Ki,
s:
Suna Na Sakoge Dastaa Apni Bewafayi Ki,
Kiye Hain Tumne Hazaron Jakhm Dil-E-Yaar Mein,

Teri Baato Se Laga Ke Tu Pyar Karti Hai Sanam,
Maalum Pada Ke Yeh Toh Kaam Nikalne Ki Ada Thi,

Yu Banthan Ke Nikalatio Hai Apni Khusi Ke Liye,
Magar Log Samajhte Hain Ki Yeh Hai Unke Liye…

st: Dil Lagakar Aapse Pooch Rahe Hain Hum,
s:
Dil Lagakar Aapse Pooch Rahe Hain Hum,
Pyar Karne Ki Saja Kya Paa Rahe Hain Hum,

Abhi Aaye Ho Toh Batho Yeh Mosam Suhana Hai,
Abhi Toh Hale Dil Aankho Se Sunana Hai,

Sahar Sahar Mein Dhunda Hai Tumko,
Kahin Bhi Najar Na Aaye Tum Humko,

Husn Ke Kaafile Toh Bahut Mile,
Hum Bahla Na Sake Paagal Dil Ko,

Mare The Teri Soorat Par,Khuda Ka Nor Samajhkar,
Bewafa Tune Jakham Diye, Apne Ko Hoor Samajhkar…

st: Dost Bahut Hain Lekein,
s:
Dost Bahut Hain Lekein,
Har Dost Dil Ke Kareeb Hote Nahi,

Jo Sachha Dost Hai,
Woh Kabhi Gham Deta Nahi,

Dil Kehta Hai Ek Din,
Khushi Tere Kadam Chumegi,

Bharosa Rakhna Kismat Par,
Kyun Ki Kismat Bewafa Hote Nahi…

st: Dard Hi Sahi Mere Isq Ka,
s:
Dard Hi Sahi Mere Isq Ka,
Innam To Aaya,

Khali Hi Sahi Hathon Mein,
Jaam To Aaya,

Main Hun Bewafa,
Sabko Bataya Usne,

Yun Hi Sahi Unke Labon Pe,
Mera Naam Toh Aaya…

st: Chaand Ka Kya Kasoor,
s:
Chaand Ka Kya Kasoor,
Agar Raat Bewafa Nikli,

Unse Kya Kahen,
Woh To Sachhe The,

Shayad Hamari Takder Hi,
Hum Se Khafa Nikli …

st: Kisi Aur Ki Bahon Mein Rahakar,
s:
Kisi Aur Ki Bahon Mein Rahakar,
Woh Humse Wafa Ki Baaten Karte Hain,

Yeh Kaisi Chahat Hai Yaaro,
Woh Bewafa Hai Jaankar Bhi,

Hum Unhi Se Pyar Karte Hain…

st: Nazrein Meri Thak Na Jaaye,
s:
Nazrein Meri Thak Na Jaaye,
Bewafa Tera Intezar Karte Karte,

Yeh Jaan Yun Hi Nikal Na Jaaye,
Tum Se Isq Ka Izhaar Karte Karte,

Jahaan Waale Dekhte Hain Ghur Ghur Kar,
Ke Hamein Yeh Kya Beemari Ho Gayi Hai…

st: Nadaani Mein Hum Kise Apna Samajh Baithe,
s:
Nadaani Mein Hum Kise Apna Samajh Baithe,
Jo Dikhaaya Us Bewafa Ne Sapna, Hum Haqeeqat Samajh Baithe

Dekho Aaj Chhod Diya Hamein, Usne Eik Gair Ke Liye,
Jise Hum Apna Humsafar Samajh Baithe…

st: Main Paa Na Sakaa Tujhe Shaayad Meri Hi Khataa Hogi,
s:
Main Paa Na Sakaa Tujhe Shaayad Meri Hi Khataa Hogi,
Meri Mohabbat Hogi Badnaam Aur Tanhaai Meri Sazaa Hogi,

Main Wo Nahi Jo Badnaam Karunga Tujhe Bewafa Kahkar
Sadaa Khush Rahe Tu Yahi Tujhko ”Jaan” Meri Dua Hogi,

Kho Jayega ”Rajan” Bhi Shayad Duniya Ki Bheed Mein Kahin
Magar Jab Tak Chalegi Saans Labon Pe Teri Hi Sadaa Hogi…

st: Usko Chaha To Bahut Magar Wo Mila Hi Nahi
s:
Usko Chaha To Bahut Magar Wo Mila Hi Nahi
Laakh Koshish Ki Magar Faasla Mita Hii Nahi,

Usko Zamaane Ne Majboor Is Kadar Kar Diya
Ke Meri Kisi Sadaa Pe Wo Rukaa Hi Nahi,

Khuda Se Jholi Faila Ke Maanga Tha Use
Khuda Ne Meri Kisi Dua Ko Sunaa Hi Nahi,

Har Ek Se Pucha Sabab Uske Na Milne Ka
Har Ek Ne Bataaya Ki Wo Mere Liye Banaa Hi Nahi,

Main Tamaam Umar Ki Koshish Ke Bawjood Nakaam Ho Gaya
Aur Wo Usko Mil Gaya Jisne Use Kabhi Maanga Hi Nahi,

Itni Siddat Se Chaha Magar Tu Kisi Aur Ki Ho Gayi
Shayad Is Jaha Mein Wafa Ka Koi Sila Hi Nahin….

st: Muddate Mohabbat Ki Bhi Vo Aabru Na Rakh Sake,
s:
Muddate Mohabbat Ki Bhi Vo Aabru Na Rakh Sake,
Duniya Ke Dar Se Vo Aahen Bhi Na Bhar Sake,
Khud Rusvaai Se Darkar Vo Hamein Rusva Karne Lage,
Bewafai Kar Ke Vo Hamein Bawafa Hi Kahane Lage…

st: Humne Jise Dil-O-Jaan Se Chaha
s:
Humne Jise Dil-O-Jaan Se Chaha
Us Bewafa Ne Kisi Aur Ko Chaha,
Pata Nahi Hum Kyu Unke Liye Fariyaad Karte Hain,
Jo Pyar Ke Bahaane Hamein Barbaad Karte Hain…

st: Aapko Bhool Jayen Itne Bewafa Nahi Ham,
s:
Aapko Bhool Jayen Itne Bewafa Nahi Ham,
Aapse Kya Gila Karen Aapse Koi Gila Nahin,
Kash Toh Apne Gam Mujhe De De Toh Sukun Mile,
Vo Kitna Badnasib Hai Jise Gam Mila Hi Nahi…

st: Log kehte hai usme wafa nai,
s:
Log kehte hai usme wafa nai,
agar sookun uski aankho mai hai,
to wo bewafa hi sahi….

st: Hme to apno ne loota gairo mein kahan dam tha,
s:
Hme to apno ne loota gairo mein kahan dam tha,
Meri kisti waha dubi jaha pani bhut kam tha,
Hum chahte to tod kar rakh dete har ek rishta,
magar uski masoon sa dikhne wala chehra nam tha,
Maine toh use bahut chaha, par uska pyar toh bahut kam tha…

st: Barang Tumari Duniya Hai Barang Meri Tasveer Bani,
s:
Barang Tumari Duniya Hai Barang Meri Tasveer Bani,

Befawa Mari Kismet The Befawa He Mari Takdeer Bani…

st: Kis Kis Bewafa Se Ru-Baru Karayein Aapko
s:
Kis Kis Bewafa Se Ru-Baru Karayein Aapko
Jb hamari pehli mohbbat hi bewafa nikli…

st: Ek raj jo jamaane se chhupaaye rakha tha,
s:
Ek raj jo jamaane se chhupaaye rakha tha,
teri yaado ko dil me basaaye rakha tha,
main jaanta tha tu na aayegi mere tute aaine mein,
phir bhi apne tute aasiyaane ko sajaaye rakha tha…

st: Maut mangte hain to zindagi khafa ho jati hai,
s:
Maut mangte hain to zindagi khafa ho jati hai,
Zaher lete hain to wo bhi dawa ho jati hai,
Tu hi bata aye dost kya karun,
Jisko bhi chahte hain to wo bewafa ho jate hain…

st: Na woh ab humara haal puchte hain,
s:
Na woh ab humara haal puchte hain,
Bagair unke kaise rahe hum,
Na ye sawal puchte hain,
Kabhi rehta tha jinhe humare jawab ka intezar,
Aaj woh hi humse befijul se sawal puchte hai…

st: Bewafaa Kuch Dost Ho Gaye Humaare,
s:
Bewafaa Kuch Dost Ho Gaye Humaare,
Jo Humara Intezar Nahi Kartey,
Kabhi Humsey Bahut Batein Kiya Kartey They Wo,
Ab To Wo Humey Yaad Bhi Nahi Kartey…

st: Zindagi Mita Kar Hamari Nayi Ek Dunia Sajaa Rahi Hai Vo,
s:
Zindagi Mita Kar Hamari Nayi Ek Dunia Sajaa Rahi Hai Vo,
Kisi Ek Bewafa Ke Liye Hume Bhula Rahi Hai Vo,
Duniya Waalo Ki Baato Se Bachne Ke Liye,
Chehra Apna Kisi Ke Peeche Chupa Rahi Hai Vo…

st: Unke fareb ko hum hansi samajhte rahe,
s:
Unke fareb ko hum hansi samajhte rahe,
Apni maut ko jindagi samajhte rahe,
Wo bewafa hame pal-pal Zakham dete rahe,
Ye dil nadaan ise dil lagi samajhte rahe….

st: Kaash Koi Aisa Aaina Hota Jisme Hoti Pehchan Bewafa Ki,
s:
Kaash Koi Aisa Aaina Hota Jisme Hoti Pehchan Bewafa Ki,
To Na Hi Dil Toot’ta Kisi Ka Na Hi Koi Tanha Hota,

Waqt Ke Saath Saath Kaash Woh Zakhm Bhi Bhar Jata,
Jinka Is Zamane Me Koi Marham Nahi Hota,

Na Yaad Aati Wo Bhuli – Bhusri Baatein,
Na Hi Shaam Dhale Koi Lekar Sahara Andhero ka Rota,

Mein Aansu kyu Bahaon Kaushal Jo Chhod Gaya Mujhe,
Zindagi Bhar Ka To Koi Kisi Ka Sahara Nahi Hota…

st: Zindagi ki shama mein khud ko jala jayenge
s:
Zindagi ki shama mein khud ko jala jayenge
Ae-bewafa zindagi hum tujhe chhor jayenge
kal rahenge saath kiske ye main nahi jaanta
tamanna na rakhna tu meri mojudagi ki
Apna katra katra hum tujhme bhool jayenge…

st: jo phool tum ne dia us me khushboo na rahee,
s:
jo phool tum ne dia us me khushboo na rahee,
jo pyar tum ne kia us me wafa na rahee,
ye sab khud b khud hota gya,
is me meri koi khata na rahee…

st: Hasrate thi jo dil mein baya hum kar na paye,
s:
Hasrate thi jo dil mein baya hum kar na paye,
unko apni zindagi se fanna hum kar na paye,
unko apna dil hum de hi chuke the,
hum anjaan the ki wo humse wafa kar na paye…

st: meri bhi yaaro wahi puraani si kahaani
s:
meri bhi yaaro wahi puraani si kahaani
wo tuti hui kashti wo majdhaar ka paani
mujhe bhi kisi ne beech raah me chhoda
naam diya bewafa aur dil mera toda
maine bhi utahaya wahi badnaam sa kadam…
mehbooba banaya sharaab ko aur haath me le li kalam
ye tha ab tak ki shayari ka safar
shaayad uski judaai de rahi hai mujhe ye hunar…
uss haseena ki yaad me mai yunhi likhta rahunga
aur isi tarah aap sabko yahan dikhta rahunga…

st: aye khuda meri shaayri me wo asar karde
s:
aye khuda meri shaayri me wo asar karde
main bewafa hi sahi aashiqon me mera naam amar karde
kuch karde aisa ki asar ho jaaye meri duaaon me
ke mera  gunaah chupp jaye meri  hi wafaaon me
tu chheen le chaahe to meri kismat se har phool magar
kabhi koi kaanta na aaye mere mehboob ki raahon me
meri kismat me tu likhde chaahe laakh aansoo..
magar kabhi koi aansu na dena mere pyaar ki nigaahon me
kar kabool  fariyaad karta hai Rajan teri panaahon me
dam nikle to nikle koi gamm nahi, bass nikle mere yaar ki baahon me

st: kabhi kehta tha mujhe ke koi duaa hoon mai
s:
kabhi kehta tha mujhe ke koi duaa hoon mai
aaj wo keh gya mujhko ki bewafa hoon mai..
wo jee na paata tha lamha kabhi bagair mere
aaj kehne laga mujhko ki ek sazaa hoon mai..
yahi dastoor hai aur aisa hi hota aaya
lagi maashuq ke mehndi  aur aashiq rota aaya..
magar riwaaz bhi ye ulta kar diya maine
bina chaahat kisi ki maang bhar diya maine..
kiya hai jo bhi ispe khud se hi khafa hoon mai
aaj wo keh gya mujhko ki bewafa hoon mai..

st: Hanste Hain Yun Hans Kar Rula Jate Hein Log,
s:
Hanste Hain Yun Hans Kar Rula Jate Hein Log,
Milte Hain Yunhi Mil Kar Juda Ho Jate Hein Log,
Pal Do Pal Ki Mohabbat Ko Umar Ka Saath Samjhna,
Mohabbat Bi Karte Hain Or Khafa Bhi Ho Jate Hain Log,
Naseeb Mein Pyar Na Tha Jo Mujhe Mila Hi Nahi,
Kr Ke Izhaar_E_Mohabbat Bhi Beparwaah Ho Jate Hain Log,
Ab Kis Say Shikwa Karen Apni Mohabbat Ka Aye “Hasan”
Kar K Wafa Ka Vaada Bewafa Ho Jate Hain Log…

st: Wo Jo Apna Tha Humse Hai Khafa,
s:
Wo Jo Apna Tha Humse Hai Khafa,
Pata Nahi Kis Se Huyi Thi Kya Khata,
Be-Wajah Dil Nahi Tut-Taa Kisi Ka,
Tum The Ya Hum The Bewafa…

st: Usne Mujhe Apni Bewafai Ka Sabut De Diya,
s:
Usne Mujhe Apni Bewafai Ka Sabut De Diya,
Mujhe Meri Khushiyo Ki Judai Ka Sabut De Diya,
Usne Dikha Diya ’Kumar’ Ishq-E-Wafa Ka Anjaam Kya Hota Hai,
Mujhe Duniya Ki Bheed Me Meri Tanhai Ka Sabut De Diya…

st: Dard Se Hum Ab Khelna Seekh Gaye,
s:
Dard Se Hum Ab Khelna Seekh Gaye,
Hum Bawafai Ke Saath Jeena Seekh Gaye,
Kya Batayein Kis Kadar Dil Toota Hai Mera,
Maut Se Pehle, Kafan Aud Ker Sona Seekh Gaye….

st: Aankhon Say Behtay Yeh Ashq Nahi, Khoon-E-Dil Ki Nishani Hai,
s:
Aankhon Say Behtay Yeh Ashq Nahi, Khoon-E-Dil Ki Nishani Hai,
Kuch Teri Bewafai Ki Aur Kuch Meri Wafai Ki Kahani Hai,
Kaash Aansuo Ke Saath Yaadein Bhi Beh Jati, Kaash Meri Khamoshi Sab Kuch Keh Pati,
Kaash Kismat Khuda Ne Theek Se Likhi Hoti Toh Meri Kismat Mein Pyar Ki Kami Na Reh Jati….

st: Gunah Hua Hai Mujhse Yeh Maana Maine,
s:
Gunah Hua Hai Mujhse Yeh Maana Maine,
Kya Thi Majboori Kya Kabhi Jaana Tumne,
Zakhm Tumko Mila Hai Per Dard Humko Hota Hai,
Apni Bawafai Per Dil Saari Saari Raat Rota Hai,
Kerdia Maaf Keh Ke Apna Gam Na Seene Mein Dabaya,
Suji Huyi Aankhe Aur Murjhaya Hua Chehra Humse Na Chupaya,
Kuch Ker Humper Raham Aur De Humko Saza,
Yuh Aansu Bahaker Hum Ko Aur Na Tadpa….

st: Rooth Gayi Hai Khuda Ki Khudai Humse,
s:
Rooth Gayi Hai Khuda Ki Khudai Humse,
Kahi Maar Na Daale Unki Judai Hume,
Pyar MiLega Isi Aash Me Jeeye Jaa Raha Hu,
Uss Bewafa Ke Naam Se Peeye Ja Raha Hu….

st: Teri Bewafai Ka Kuchh Aisa Asar Tha,
s:
Teri Bewafai Ka Kuchh Aisa Asar Tha,
Meri Wafao Se Khuda Bhi Bekhabar Tha,
Wo To Ho Gya Jo Wo Chahati Thi,
Mgar Afasos Yaaro Ho Wo Bhi Gya Jiska Muzhe Darr Tha,
Aankho Se Neend Gyi Dil Ka Krar Gya,
Zakham Bhi Nasoor Mile Dil Ko Samjhana Bekar Gya,
Mar-Mar K Jiya H Harpal ‘Kumar’ Kuchh Aisa Mera Hasar Tha…

st: Jab Bhi Kaali Ghatha Chadh Aati Hai,
s:
Jab Bhi Kaali Ghatha Chadh Aati Hai,
Mann Mein Ek Udasi Si Chha Jaati Hai,
Kabhi Mile The Aise Hi Mahaul Mein,
Yeh Soch Ker Aankh Meri Bhar Aati Hai,
Ab Saath Nahi Is Baat Ka Bada Gam Hai,
Yaadon Mein Teri Jitna Rolu Kam Hai,
Judai Ne Teri Hum Ko Bahut Sataya Hai,
Kya Batayen Kaise Mann Ko Samjhaya Hai,
Bewafai Teri Hum Kabhi Maaf Na Ker Payenge,
Mar Jayenge Per Laut Ker Na Teri Mehfil Mein Ayenge,
Kayamat Ka Ab Hai Humko Intezaar,
Dard-E-Bewafai Tu Bhi Chakh Leh Ek Baar,
Phir Tujhe Hum Milne Zaroor Ek Baar Ayenge,
Sukoon Mile Ga Dil Ko To Laut Jayenge,
Per Dua Teri Khush-Haali Ki Hum Kiya Kerte Hai,
Kya Kare Tujhe Aaj Bhi Pyar Kerte Hai,
Kya Kare Tujhe Aaj Bhi Pyar Kerte Hai…

st: Toote Dil Ne Bhi Uske Liye Dua Maangi,
s:
Toote Dil Ne Bhi Uske Liye Dua Maangi,
Meri Saanso Ne Har Pal Uski Khushi Maangi,
Jane Kya Dillagi Thi Us Se,
Aakhri Khwaish Mein Bhi Us Bewafa Ki Wafa Maangi…

st: Pyar Ke Liye Us Se Izazat Mangi
s:
Pyar Ke Liye Us Se Izazat Mangi
Tute Dilne Bhi Uske Liye Dua Mangi
Jane Kya Baat Thi Us Bewafa Me Ki
Maine Aakhri Khwaish Me Bhi Us Se Milne Ki Dua Mangi…

st: Sawalon Me Ulajh Ke Reh Gayi Duniya Meri
s:
Sawalon Me Ulajh Ke Reh Gayi Duniya Meri
Kyo Hui Aise Jo Hai Aaj Haalat Meri
Kya Tha Kasoor Jo Mili Itne Badi Saza
Kya Hai Teri Bewafai Ki Wajah
Kyo Toda Tumne Mere Dil Ko
Kya Thi Kami, Sirf Jaan Hi Toh Na Di Thi Tumko
Agar Maang Laati Meri Jaan Bhi Toh Shayad Itna Dard Na Hota
Jitna Jeene Me Teri Bewafai Ke Saath Hota Hai
Ek Ehsaan Ker, Apne Saath Leja Apni Yaadon Ko
Apni Muskurahat Aur Apni Baato Ko…

st: Ek Sham Se Kiya Tha Wada Ke Na Phir Pyar Ke Beej Boyenge
s:
Ek Sham Se Kiya Tha Wada Ke Na Phir Pyar Ke Beej Boyenge
Yaad Aayegi Uss Bewafa Ki Toh Chupke Se Royenge
Lo Phir Ek Sham Aayi Hai, Yaadein Uss Bewafa Ki Kaali Ghata Ban Chhayi Hai
Sataya Hai Phir Unke Bewafayion Ne, Rulaya Hai Dil Ki Tanhayion Ne
Bahar Toh Barsat Ho Rahi Hai, Dil Mein Gum Ka Sailab Uth Raha Hai
Kidhar Jayein Kisko Dekhayein, Zakhm Dil Ka Jo Phir Hara Ho Raha Hai…

st: Kuch Waqt Tanhai Mein Beetaya Toh
s:
Kuch Waqt Tanhai Mein Beetaya Toh
Kuch Yaadein Taza Ho Gayi

Raah Mein Mila Tha Koi Saathi
Kaise Mujh Se Bewafa Ho Gayi

Dil Par Likha Tha Jiska Naam Humne Bade Pyar Se
Kaise Rooh Us Se Juda Ho Gayi

Abh Soch Ker Hum Roh Toh Pade Hain
Magar Phir Sochta Hoon Ab Bahut Der Hogayi

Kuch Waqt Toh Woh Bhi Thehra Tha Uss Mod Per
Jahan Rooh Badan Se Juda Ho Gayi

st: Sari Raat Baith Kar Apni  Likha Maine
s:
Sari Raat Baith Kar Apni  Likha Maine
Jab Kalam Uthai To Khud Ko Deewana Likha Maine
Ye Vaadiyan, Ye Manjar Ye Chaand Sitare Lagte Hain Apne Se
In Apno Ke Beech Khud Ko Begana Likha Maine
Wo Baith Kar Chali Gyi Raqeebo Ki Doli Mein
Uski Is Bewafai Ko Bhi Mazboori Ka Bahana Likha Maine
Na Chaahte Hue Bhi, Khuda Jaanta Hai Usko Shama Khud Ko Parwana Likha Main…

st: Haraa Hai Abhi Zakhm-E-Taalluq Dil Ka
s:
Haraa Hai Abhi Zakhm-E-Taalluq Dil Ka
Gire Jo Sailaab-E-Lahoo-E-Ashq Daman Pe Mera
Dekhi Ek Woh Zalak Unki Andaaz-E-Tabassum Liye
Uske Altaaf Ka Mafhoom Hum Pyar Ka Andaz Jo Samaje
Tamanna-E-Dil Woh Milae Muje Safar Mein Kahin
Chahe Milae Muje ‘Sheikh’ Woh Bewafa Bankar Hi Sahi…

st: Waqt Guzrega Toh Hum Sambhal Jayenge
s:
Waqt Guzrega Toh Hum Sambhal Jayenge
Maut Se Pehla Samajh Jayenge
Ki Bewafai Unki Fitrat Hai, Na Ki Majburi
Tanhai Mein Hi Sahi, Hum Phir Se Bus Jayenge…

st: Husn Ki Mehfil Thi, Ishq Ka Tarana Tha
s:
Husn Ki Mehfil Thi, Ishq Ka Tarana Tha
Pahunch Gaye Hum Wahan, Jahan Bewafai Ka Thikana Tha
Dil Ne Chuna Bhi Use, Jise Bewafa Kehlana Tha

Chalo Koi Baat Nahi
Zakham Hame Milna Tha Aur Dard Ko Pana Tha…

st: Tum Agar Yaad Rakhoge To Inayat Hogi
s:
Tum Agar Yaad Rakhoge To Inayat Hogi
Warna Humko Kahan Tum Se Shikayat Hogi
Yeh To Bewafa Logo Ki Duniya Hai
Tum Agar Bhool Bhi Jao To Riwayat Hogi…

st: Zindgi Basar Nahi Karte Tanha
s:
Zindgi Basar Nahi Karte Tanha
Tanhai To Murdo Ka Naseeb Hota Hai
Woh Bewafa Hai To Bewafa Hi Sahi
Bewafa Bhi Dil Ke Kareeb Hota Hai…
